column4: can anyone tell me: What are the advantages, if any, of doing a fresh install of Ubuntu 7.10, when one can do an upgrade? Thank you..
oh, I have an amd 64 computer. how can i upgrade from 7.04 32 bit to 7.10 64 bit? Thank you.
you cant upgrade from a 32bit to a 64bit AFAIK. i may be wrong, but i think you have to do a clean install
do you have a usb drive? another partition you can copy them to? burn them to a dvd-rw ?
